name: Danger Formation
description:
Blast your way through space with an entire squadron at your back. This arcade style shooter lets you control a group of spacecraft all at once. Make your way through procedurally generated levels, collecting credits and hiring additional units as you go. Watch your weapons get stronger as you fight, thanks to your ship's adaptive weapons system. See if you can live long enough to reach the maximum squad size. With enough skill and a dash of luck you may even make it to the fabled galactic nexus. Fun for the whole family!

Controls:

Press F to gate in additional units. Each unit costs 10 credits.

Press Space to switch between units.

Move with WASD, aim with mouse, shoot with left mouse button.

Reach the jumpgate to go to the next sector. The galactic nexus is in sector 13.

It's game over when all units are destroyed.

Developed for IGMC 2015 in Unity by:

Design - Jesse Gallagher

Logo - Kim Crenshaw

Would appreciate it if you voted for it if you enjoy playing it.
